articles.author: Paula Slier in Moscow
articles.title: WAR IN EUROPE: The West doesn't get it – Russians aren't 'zombified', and most of them are pro-Putin - Daily Maverick
articles.description: By far the majority of Russians, while heartbroken, believe Russia was forced into the war.
articles.content:
I have just got off the phone with my niece who lives in London. She asked where I was. On hearing it was Russia, at all of five years old, she exclaimed: Why are you in that naughty country?

articles.title: European markets climb ahead of Ukraine-Russia talks; Stoxx 600 up 1% - CNBC
articles.description: European stocks traded higher on Tuesday as another round of Ukraine-Russia talks got underway.

articles.title: Explainer: Omicron 'stealth' COVID variant BA.2 now dominant globally - Reuters.com
articles.description: A sub-variant of the highly transmissible Omicron version of coronavirus known as BA.2 is now dominant worldwide, prompting surges in many countries in Europe and Asia and raising concern over the potential for a new wave in the United States.

articles.title: Germany to prosecute use of ‘Z’ symbol to support Russia’s war - POLITICO Europe

articles.content:
